revised_title: A Description of a New Walnut Tree Species
tldr: The author, Monsieur Reneaume, discovers a new species of walnut tree with unique leaf characteristics. The tree has irregularly cut leaves, some forked at the end, and others with a winged stalk. The author compares the ornamental leaves to those used in painting and heraldry. The tree's identity and fruit characteristics are yet to be confirmed.
